languages.text: Ты была права. "Призрака" Теодоры призвала Идира. Оставлять ее в команде нельзя — контролировать свои способности она не может. Проследи, чтобы она покинула корабль в ближайшем порту. Снабди деньгами, если попросит.

traits.locale_text: Ты была права. "Призрака" Теодоры призвала Идира. Оставлять ее в команде нельзя — контролировать свои способности она не может. Проследи, чтобы она покинула корабль в ближайшем порту. Снабди деньгами, если попросит.

languages.text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."
languages.original_text: Ты была права. "Призрака" Теодоры призвала Идира. Оставлять ее в команде нельзя — контролировать свои способности она не может. Проследи, чтобы она покинула корабль в ближайшем порту. Снабди деньгами, если попросит.

traits.locale_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

"You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

"You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

"You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

languages.text: “你猜得没错，是伊迪拉召唤了西奥多拉的‘幽灵’。我不可能再把她留在我的船员之中，她根本控制不了她自己的能力。等下次入港的时候，就让她走人吧。如果她想要钱的话，给她点钱。”
languages.original_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

traits.locale_text: “你猜得没错，是伊迪拉召唤了西奥多拉的‘幽灵’。我不可能再把她留在我的船员之中，她根本控制不了她自己的能力。等下次入港的时候，就让她走人吧。如果她想要钱的话，给她点钱。”

languages.text: «Tenía razón. Idira invocó al "fantasma" de Theodora. Mantenerla en la tripulación no es una opción; no puede controlar sus habilidades. Asegúrese de que abandona la nave en el puerto más cercano. Dele algo de dinero si lo pide».
languages.original_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

traits.locale_text: «Tenía razón. Idira invocó al "fantasma" de Theodora. Mantenerla en la tripulación no es una opción; no puede controlar sus habilidades. Asegúrese de que abandona la nave en el puerto más cercano. Dele algo de dinero si lo pide».

languages.text: 「お前の言葉は正しかった。イディラはシオドーラの『亡霊』を召喚したのだ。イディラをクルーのままにしておくことなど、到底考えられん…彼女は能力を制御できていない。最寄りの港で船を降ろすように取り計らってくれ。彼女が金を要求してきたら、いくらか渡してやれ」
languages.original_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の言葉は正しかった。イディラはシオドーラの『亡霊』を召喚したのだ。イディラをクルーのままにしておくことなど、到底考えられん…彼女は能力を制御できていない。最寄りの港で船を降ろすように取り計らってくれ。彼女が金を要求してきたら、いくらか渡してやれ」

languages.text: "Ihr hattet recht. Idira hat den 'Geist' von Theodora gerufen. Es kommt nicht infrage, sie in der Crew zu belassen. Sie kann ihre Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren. Seht zu, dass Idira Tlass das Schiff im nächsten Hafen verlässt. Und gebt ihr etwas Geld, wenn sie darum bittet."
languages.original_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hattet recht. Idira hat den 'Geist' von Theodora gerufen. Es kommt nicht infrage, sie in der Crew zu belassen. Sie kann ihre Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren. Seht zu, dass Idira Tlass das Schiff im nächsten Hafen verlässt. Und gebt ihr etwas Geld, wenn sie darum bittet."

languages.text: « Vous aviez raison. Idira a invoqué le "fantôme" de Théodora. Il est hors de question de la garder dans l'équipage. De toute évidence, elle est incapable de maîtriser ses pouvoirs. Veillez à ce qu'elle quitte le vaisseau au port le plus proche. Et si elle vous le demande, donnez-lui un peu d'argent. »
languages.original_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous aviez raison. Idira a invoqué le "fantôme" de Théodora. Il est hors de question de la garder dans l'équipage. De toute évidence, elle est incapable de maîtriser ses pouvoirs. Veillez à ce qu'elle quitte le vaisseau au port le plus proche. Et si elle vous le demande, donnez-lui un peu d'argent. »

languages.text: "Haklıymışsın. İdira, Theodora'nın 'hayaletini' çağırmış. Artık onu mürettebatta tutmamız mümkün değil. Kabiliyetlerini kontrol edemiyor. En yakındaki rıhtımda gemiden inmesini sağlayın. Para isterse verin."
languages.original_text: "You were right. Idira summoned the 'ghost' of Theodora. Keeping her in the crew is out of the question — she cannot control her abilities. See to it that she leaves the ship at the nearest port. Give her some money if she asks for it."

traits.locale_text: "Haklıydın. İdira, Theodora'nın 'hayaletini' çağırmış. Artık onu mürettebatta tutmamız mümkün değil. Kabiliyetlerini kontrol edemiyor. En yakındaki rıhtımda gemiden inmesini sağlayın. Para isterse verin."
